msIdentifier.repository: Washington State Archives, Eastern Regional Branch
msIdentifier.collection: Spokane County Government; Clerk, Territorial Case Files, 1879-1889

div1.p:
Territory of Washington,
County of Spokane.} SS.

Territory of Washington, Plaintiff
vs.
S.P. White
Defendant }
In the District Court of the Territory of Washington and for the First Fourth Judicial District thereof, holding terms at Cheney, Spokane County, in said Territory
To the Sheriff of Lincoln County, Greeting:

In the name of the United States, You are hereby commanded to summon William Rhodes Wells Williams Josiah Cole to be and appear before the District Court aforesaid at the Court House, in Cheney, in said County, on the Instante day of April A.D. 1885, at - o'clock - M., to there give evidence in the above entitled cause on the part of said Plaintiff.
Witness the Hon. George Turner Associate Justice of the Supreme Court of Washington Territory, and Judge of said Court, and the Seal thereof affixed, this 20 day of April A.D. 1885

Kate W. Feuerbach Clerk.
By R Strobach Deputy

Territory of Washington,
County of Lincoln } SS
I hereby certify that I served the within Subpoena on the within named witness by reading the same to them in said County, on this 20th 23rd day of April A.D. 1885

Jno Cody Sheriff
By J.N. Friedlander, Deputy
I hereby certify that Wm. Rodes is a sutiable person to serve subpoenas

Jno Cody
Sheriff Lincoln County
J.N. Friedlander
Dpty.

Wm. Rodes
Wells Williams
Josiah Cole
Case No. 1537
In the District Court of the Territory of Washington, and for the First Judicial District thereof, holding Terms at Cheney, Spokane County, in, said Territory

Returned and Filed this 30 day of April A.D. 1885
Kate N. Feuerbach
By R. Strobach Deputy

Sheriff's Fees
Serving 3: names at 40 1.20
Mileage 164 miles at 10 16.40
Total,---$17.20
